name: places/ChIJKbir2b5YwokRHY9OjpM716w
adrFormatAddress: 1524 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10075-0503, USA

editorialSummary.text: Department of the Walgreens chain providing prescription medications & other health-related items.

originalText.text: Not even one star, I would leave ZERO if I could! Their employees are a joke. The purposely turn off their phones or leave the line open so it’s always busy when you call. The prescriptions are NEVER available or on time. I took my business elsewhere. This company will never see another dime from me.

text.text: Not even one star, I would leave ZERO if I could! Their employees are a joke. The purposely turn off their phones or leave the line open so it’s always busy when you call. The prescriptions are NEVER available or on time. I took my business elsewhere. This company will never see another dime from me.

originalText.text: Do not come here for your vaccinations. The wait is interminable even if you have an appointment

text.text: Do not come here for your vaccinations. The wait is interminable even if you have an appointment

originalText.text:
The pharmacy is a train wreck. I've never seen multiple day delays for a simple refill. It's impossible to call in and talk to the pharmacist...I waited over 1/2 hour on hold without ever speaking to another human.

I finally had to give up to see if I could move my prescriptions elsewhere, as I don't want to wait 2 or 3 days passed the refill date to *possibly* get my prescriptions, it's just crazy.

I went at 8:30 at night to try and pick an rx up that was supposed to be done. It was not done of course. There were dozens of really upset people in line getting really upset with repeatedly being told to return, only to be told the meds aren't filled.

I did get a hold of the PR department and explained the craziness going on there, they assured my someone would contact me.

I finally got a breif email from the store manager only leaving the same phone number that I just spent 30 minutes on hold. That a great way to avoid dealing with angry customers, just take the phone off the hook.

3 days later I still don't have my prescriptions. I just give up. Someone in this town will want to fill the prescriptions, I will move them somewhere.

Don't come here whatever you do. It's the ThunderDome of prescription medicine...but not in an entertaining way.

originalText.text: Ordered online for pickup. Products were available. They just canceled all the order saying everything was out of stock…
